title: Politics in the antebellum US - change

content.question: Politics in the antebellum United States changed dramatically because

choices.label: expanded White male suffrage broadened participation in elections
female suffrage became a topic of debate in the House of Representatives
widespread electoral reform resulted in direct election of senators
the power of the federal government expanded to ensure the equal protection of all citizens
the government sought to assimilate American Indians in the West

content.answer: expanded White male suffrage broadened participation in elections

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
